prompts: Create a Pokémon that resembles a small, star-shaped creature with a pastel color palette.
I want a Pokémon that looks playful and cheerful, with large, expressive eyes and soft curves.
Generate a cute Pokémon that has a bubbly texture and a whimsical design.
Make a Pokémon with a starry theme, featuring pink and white colors with a hint of shine.
Imagine a creature that embodies joy and lightness, with a fluffy appearance and a dynamic pose.
Design a pink, star-shaped Pokémon that floats gracefully and has a gentle expression.
Show me a whimsical Pokémon that captures the essence of a star in a cartoonish style.
